about_the_game:
Create in Unity like never before with The Platform by AGIS. Our free-forever system will revolutionize the way you, and anyone, builds, interacts and plays in Unity.

The Platform by AGIS is your ultimate creative toolkit, equipped with ground-breaking features (see below) that have never been seen before in Unity. Are you a novice taking your first steps? A seasoned developer with years of experience? Platform majorly pushes the boundaries of what you’ve seen as possible in Unity. All it takes is a few moments to create a playable experience you can play with friends and share with the world.

Gamers will find an endless supply of new worlds to play in. Content creators will be able to leverage never-before-seen levels of Twitch integration and YouTube creation options.

Features


*Achieve more by collaborating in real-time with others in Unity, with multi-user editing in real-time

*Step into your player’s shoes through immersive building experiences in VR

*Drag and drop from an extensive, cost-free asset library all from a single screen. Bring any asset into any scene in an intuitive way, with a 10,000+ inbuilt asset library

*No "IDE" to use! All development functionality is built right into the app, so whether you're on tablet or in a headset, create share and play all at once!

*NPCs can talk! Powered by our next-gen AI and large language models we use 11labs to generate audio with a multitude of voices and voice cloning! Create sound effects, music, and more using prompts with AI-powered audio generation

*Build once publish everywhere - Tablet, PS5, PSVR2, PCVR with or without Raytracing!

*Improve productivity and efficiency with AI-assisted coding

*Use included high-end functionality to easily enhance gameplay variety, including destruction, water/volumes, weather, rivers, roads, day/night cycle etc.

With The Platform, you’re able to leverage a “modding” approach to user engagement without the standalone development client (IDE). The Platform blends the standout features of games like Roblox and Garry's Mod to create a fresh, purpose-built experience that adapts to all devices, including VR, HDRP, and mobile capabilities.

The Platform will be free forever and accessible for all ages/experience levels. You’ll see that The Platform majorly pushes the boundaries of what you’ve seen as possible before. All it takes is a few moments to create a playable experience you can play with friends and share with the world. Gamers will find an endless supply of new worlds to play in. Content creators will be able to leverage never-before-seen levels of Twitch integration and YouTube creation options.

Wishlist The Platform on Steam!
